text: Benjamin Schiff “Ben” Platt (born September 24, 1993) is an American actor and singer-songwriter. He is known for his main role in the Broadway musical Dear Evan Hansen (2015–2017). This role earned him a Tony, Emmy, and Grammy Award. At 23, Platt became the youngest individual winner of the Tony Award for Best Actor in a Leading Role in a Musical. Platt played the role of Evan Hansen in 2021 movie version of the musical. Platt is openly gay. == Albums == Honeymind is Platts' upcoming third studio album. It will be released on May 31, 2024, via Interscope Records. Platt announced the album on social media, inspired by a hike he took with his fianceé, Noah Galvin. The album was written over two years across Nashville, Savannah, Los Angeles, and New York. Two singles preceded the album: "Andrew" on March 14, and "Cherry on Top" on April 11. On March 18, 2024, Platt announced he would perform a three-week concert residency from May 28 to June 15 at the newly remodeled Palace Theatre on Broadway.
